column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////A steak is just a steak and there are a lot of good restaurants that can cook a good steak
column2: that alone doesn't let a restaurant get a perfect score.  The reason this restaurant gets 5 stars is because everything worked in conjunction with each other to a great experience.  The hosts were accommodating when we didn't have a reservation
column4: the drinks and food were delicious
column5: and the ambiance was perfect.  You are definitely getting what you pay for at Bavette's.
